name.en: Special selected topics on power electronics engineering are

description.zh: 電力電子相關領域專題講座
description.en: Special selected topics on power electronics engineering area

name.zh: 光電化學與太陽能電池

description.zh: 光電化學即利用太陽光能源或其他光源驅使一個完整的電化學氧化還原反應，並充分使用光電催化反應後產生的電子轉換為電力，即為太陽能電池，其中有機材料、無機材料與電解質為太陽光電池反應時主要的影響因素。本課程將會介紹光電化學原理與測定, 光電催化, 光電化學能轉移及儲存,不同材料發展出不同型態的太陽能電池，進而介紹光電化學如何應用於染料敏化太陽能電池。
description.en: The concept of photoelectrochemistry is to utilize the solar energy and other light sources to drive a complete electrochemical oxidation-reduction reaction where the photocatalytic electron reaction has been converted into electrical energy. Photovoltaic cells which also known as solar cells composed of organic and inorganic materials and electrolytes are the great example for the photoelectrochemical reactions. Here the proposed course is constructed to introduce and implement the basic photoelectrochemical principles, measurements, photoelectrocatalysis, photoelectrical charge transfer and the storage of chemical energy. Further the remaining section of this course will be focused on the detailed studies about the development of different inorganic, organic materials for the fabrication of dye-sensitized solar cells.

description.zh: 本課程將涵蓋討論光電學之基本應用原理並結合分子生物學之知識 （諸如 脫氧核糖核酸核糖核酸 蛋白質 或細胞的基本結構介紹） 希望能更拓展學員對光電學應用的眼界本課程目標將藉由了解光電探測儀器之操作應用,光源控制,與光源種類之差異（諸如gamma射線, X-射線, UV 光,紅外線與可見光), 進而將之應用於生物分子的觀察,與生命科學應用上,範圍之廣無可界限.
description.en: This course covers optoelectronics combine with biomolecular of knowledge. We will focus on discussing how the DNA, RNA, protein or cells related with optoelectronic application.Optoelectronics is the study and application of electronic devices that source, detect and control light, usually considered a subfield of photonics. The light often includes invisible forms of radiation such as gamma rays, X-rays, ultraviolet and infrared, in addition to visible light, which is based on the quantum mechanical effects of light on semiconducting materials. A biomolecule is any organic molecule that is produced by a living organism, including large polymeric molecules such as proteins, polysaccharides, and nucleic acids as well as small molecules such as primary metabolites, secondary metabolites, and natural products. As organic molecules, biomolecules consist primarily of carbon and hydrogen, nitrogen, and oxygen, and, to a smaller extent, phosphorus and sulfur.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 衛星影像為目前土木、水資源與防災科技所經常使用之資訊來源，其處理有別於一般之影像，主要內容將包含衛星影像幾何校正、影像分類、影像增揚、數值高程運用等。
description.en: Satellite images are one of the major information sources in civil engineering, water resources engineering and disaster prevention technologies.  Satellite image processing is different from picture image processing, mainly focusing on the satellite image geometric rectification, image classification, image enhancement, digital elevation model applications, and so forth.

description.zh: 本課程介紹熱能交換原理與熱交換相關之工程技術。內容包括：熱交換器之基礎原理、熱交換器之分類與應用、熱交換效率分析、熱傳增強技術、散熱鰭片效率與形狀分析、各種熱交換器之設計與計算。
description.en: Introduction to the principles and the technology of heat exchangers.  The subjects include: fundamentals of heat exchangers, classifications and applications of heat exchangers, analysis of heat exchanger effectiveness, heat transfer enhancement techniques, fin efficiency and fin shape analysis, design and calculation of various types of heat exchangers.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: This course purpose is searching excellence marketing approach, and presents complete of the essential marketing concepts, processes, strategies, and tactics most commonly used by the marketing manager.  Students are enable understanding of the field: marketing management, planning, situations, decisions, actions and issues.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹組織發展與變革的執行過程。課程目的有二：(1)了解組織發展與變革的內涵；(2)了解組織發展與變革的過程，以及(3)了解在組織發展與變革有效實行的過程當中，管理者在整個過程所需要的技巧。
description.en: This course focuses on the process of implementing organizational development and change. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational development and change is; (2) To gain an understanding of how organizational development and change is achieved and (3) To gain an understanding of the complex skills that allow managers to accomplish development and change effectively in organizational settings.

description.zh: 本課程主要了解行銷研究的本質與特性，掌握行銷研究要領，進而具備規劃與執行行銷研究的能力，包含下列：行銷研究的環境與基本觀念，網路資料庫介紹，資料蒐集模式與方法，問卷設計與抽樣，量表製作，資料分析，研究成果呈現與溝通。
description.en: This course aims to help participants understand the nature and features of marketing research, realize how to conduct marketing research, and develop a toolset for the planning and implementation of marketing research. It has the followings: Background of Marketing Research, Introduction to Marketing Research, Database and Data Collection: Types and Methods, Measurement Instruments and Sampling, Data Analysis, Communicating with Research Users.

description.zh: 本課程教導及訓練研究生有關英文在管理領域內特定專題的溝通運用，學生將在本課程中以英文學習: (1)管理常見之專有名詞，(2)英語備忘錄的草擬與撰寫，(3)會議資料如：議程、動議、記錄等的準備與撰寫，(4)企業計劃書的編寫，及(5)現代化全球管理相關專題英文資料的閱讀與溝通討論。學生必須在課堂上就選定的管理題材以英文做報告與其它同學討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the communication in English on the special topics within the context of management. Students are expected to learn the followings in English: (1) Terminologies commonly used in management; (2) Draft and write-up of English memorandum; (3) Development of meeting materials such as agenda, motions, minutes, etc.; (4) Business proposals and plans; and (6) Contemporary topics and trend in global management issues. Students will be required to make group presentations and discussions on the selected management topics in English.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類資料探勘技術與理論的基礎觀念及架構，以奠定學生日後從事資料探勘分析與研究工作時之需。相關的分析技術將包括應用在分類(classification)、推估(estimation)、預測(prediction)、關聯式分組(affinity grouping)、同質分組(clustering)等功能中的決策樹、(decision tree)多變量分析(multivariate analysis)及類神經網路(neural network)等方法。此外為了讓學生對相關技術有更深的瞭解，課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解在商業智慧分析上資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: Several fundamental theories of data mining techniques are included in this course. For examples, decision tree, multivariate analysis and neural network. All these techniques will be applied in different areas, such as classification, association rule, forecasting, and pattern recognition. And various applications in different enterprises are also included.

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對流通業中各項經營管理項目作探討，其中包含設施位置選定，人力資源，流通規劃，及銷售促進等。此外，商用地理資訊系統之應用及個案研討亦包含在此課程中。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the required management issues of retail business，such as location selection，human resource ，retail planning ，and marketing etc。Besides，at also includes business GIS and case study.

description.zh: 本課程介紹許多有關於員工訓練與發展的理論與研究論文，課程內容主要在探討這些常用訓練活動的內涵、運作的方式，以及改善訓練的方法。此外，本課程亦介紹諸多有關教育與學習的理論，這將有助於學生在日後工作中激勵自己與他人。
description.en: This present course introduces several main theories and research papers about employee training and development. It focuses on what the activities of training and development are, how do they work, and how to improve their effectiveness. In addition, many education and learning theories introduced in this course can also help students to motivate themselves and others at work.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、衡量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposa

name.en: Seminar on Channel Strategy and  Management

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解通路策略與管理之重要理論與整體架構，明瞭通路成員間的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路策略的分析、通路管理模式與研究方法，討論行銷通路的發展趨勢，透過個案研討使學生熟悉通路策略與管理模式之運作。而授課主題包括通路的本質、通路功能與流程、通路行為、通路策略與通路管理等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in channels strategy and   management. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case study, students will develop skills in making Channel Strategic decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations. The topics have function and flow of channel, channel behavior, channel strategy and channel management.

description.zh: 醫材料為一跨領域學科，泛指用來輔助或替代生物體組織、器官功能而會與生物體的細胞、血液、組織、蛋白質直接接觸的材料，其組成大致可分為金屬材料、陶瓷材料、高分子材料、天然材料和複合材料等。本課程將對其基礎知識和應用作深入淺出的介紹。
description.en: "Biomaterials" is an introductory course. So called biomaterials are designed for medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug controlled release, etc. They will directly interact with biological components such as cell, blood, tissue and protein. According to the composition, biomaterials are divided into metals, ceramics, polymers, natural materials and composites. In this course, the basic knowledge and the applications about biomaterials will be reviewed.

description.zh: 本課程主要的內容包括有；生物醫用材料的發展概況及趨勢；生物醫用材料的生物相容性及生物學評價；可降解與吸收材料之機制及調控；組織工程材料與人工器官--軟組織修復與重建；硬組織修復與骨組織工程材料，也就是生物活性陶瓷、金屬植入材料之表面生物活化功能和塗層；口腔材料；控制釋放材料；仿生智能材料；生物醫用材料表面改質等。
description.en: In addition to the fundamentals of surface treatment, biological interactions of materials, mechanical properties, ceramics and composite materials in biomedical application, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials will be introduced.  The contents of this course will include the development of biomaterials, the biocompatibility of materials, mechanisms of biodegradable and bio-absorbable materials. It will illustrate the advanced concepts of medical devices, artificial organs (implants), dental materials, tissue engineering and drug eluting technologies as well.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001017或負責教授同意。導論、質點系動力學、非剛體動力學、分析力學Lagrange方程式、振動理論。
description.en: Introduction of Dynamics of a System of Particles, Dynamics of Non-Rigid Body, Lagrange's Equation, and Vibration Theory.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
description.en: The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 1. fundamental metallographic concepts.2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.3. Hardenability 4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

description.zh: 藉由大量的人物寫生，從人性關懷的角度速寫記錄人生百態，速寫重點要「神」、「形」兼備。下一步是靜態單人速寫練習，體態美見於動、靜、張、弛的表現，且比例要正確。下筆速、簡、精、準、是練習重點。接下來是靜態雙人、多人速寫練習。除了依循單人速寫練習要點，並加入空間透視感，使畫面構成更生動有趣。
description.en: The course begins with a lot of figure sketching. You have to care about all walks of life, and actively observe and record their figures. Try to master both the charm and the form of the model.  Next focusing on static mono-figure sketching, you have to demonstrate your techniques in presenting either the static or the dynamic, the state of tension or looseness. You also have to be precise in proportion when you do your sketch. Stress definitely on the practice of speediness, simplicity, accuracy, and preciseness. Also work on static twin-figure and multi-figure sketching. Besides incorporating guidelines from the previous activity, you have to add the sense of spatial perspective to make your sketch more vivid and

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

notes: 修習本課程須選修"設計實務與競賽講座"

description.zh: 本課程在使學生了解灰色系統的理論及原理，進而培養學生能運用該灰色系統之理論於資訊系統，控制系統，影像處理，模糊控制，類神經網路，醫學，工業，經濟及管理等領域之應用：課程內容包含：1.灰色系統介紹  2.灰色關聯度分析  3.灰色預測原理  4.灰色建模 5.灰色決策      6.灰色控制        7.專題計劃
description.en: The principle and theory of grey system is  interoduced.  Therefore, the student can apply the grey system to information system, control system,image processing, fuzzy control, neural network, medicine, industry, economy, and management,etc..  The contents of this course is : 1. The introduction of grey system. 2.Grey relational analysis. 3.The theory of grey prediction. 4. The grey modeling. 5. Grey decision 6. Grey control. 7. Final project.

description.zh: 超低溫冷凍原理，超低溫冷凍系統設計簡介，氣體分離應用，液化氣體應用，低溫儀器，低溫冶金及低溫醫療。
description.en: Principles of cryogenic cooling, introduction to cryogenic cooling system design,gas separation applications, application in liquefied gases, low temperatureinstrumentation, low temperature metallurgy and cryomedical applications.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

notes: 一年級重補修課程(適用98年度前入學生)

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

notes: 一年級重補修課程(適用98年度前入學生)

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

notes: 二年級重補修課程(適用98年度前入學生)

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

notes: 二年級重補修課程(適用98年度前入學生),限55人

description.zh: 本課程介紹高分子結構與其特性之關係，內容包括分子量、分子組成及結構、溶液特性、相變化、自組裝性質、彈性行為、粘彈性、動態機械性質、光學、電學和光電特性。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the relationship between polymer structure and properties: focusing on the molecular conformation and configuration, solution and phase behavior, rubber elasticity, viscoelasticity, dynamic mechanical behavior, optic, electronic and optoelectronic properties.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括工業發展概況、工廠組織、工廠計劃與佈置、製造工程、工作研究、生產管制、物料管理、品質管制、成本管制、人事管理、工業安全與衛生。
description.en: General Situation of Industrial Developments, Factory Organization, Factory Plan and Layout, Manufacture Engineering, Work Study, Product Control, Materials Control,  Quality Control, Cost Control, Personnel Management, Industrial Safety and Hygiene.

description.zh: 模內塗裝(IMD)技術是把塗裝薄膜(decorative film)預置在模具型腔(cavity)內，接著再將熔膠射入型腔內薄膜的內側，即可生產最後完成的零件且在零件表面覆上塗裝薄膜上的圖案。此製程廣泛應用在3C產品，對於增進產品外觀的表面塗裝，提供降低成本有效的方法，因為不需要作二次印刷。然而此一製程需要考慮額外的設備成本、塗裝薄膜材料生產、薄膜精確定位、與模具設計等。這門課對於機械系學生將來要從事產品開發、製程設計是一門非常重要的課程。
description.en: In-mold decoration (IMD) comprises insertion of a film or foil into the cavity, followed by injection of polymer melts on the inner side of the insert to produce a part with the final finish defined by the decorative film/foil. This process is used to produce 3C product, and provides a cost-effective way of surface decoration that enhances the appearance of product, because no post treatment is needed. However, this process must consider the extra additional equipment cost, decorative film material, film positioning, and mold design. This course is very important for a mechanical department student who works about product development and manufacturing process design in the future.

notes: 四機四甲乙丙最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程提供學生初步認識何謂「核子工程」，並提供相關知識。修習內容主要包括：(1) 國際核能發展方向與趨勢，(2)核反應之基本原理，包括衰變、鏈鎖反應、分裂與融合、等，(3)各類型核電廠之基本原理、(4) 核廢料處理，(5)輻射對於生活與環境之影響。
description.en: This course provides our students first knowledge in "Nuclear Engineering". Basic material and concept to be covered are: (1) The trend and potential of International Nuclear Power; (2) Introduction to nuclear reaction; (3) Design principles of various nuclear reactors; (4) Radioactive Waste Disposal; (5) The effect of radiation to our life and environment.

description.zh: 近軸光學、光線追跡、賽德像差理論、色差校正、鏡頭設計原理、消色差雙片鏡組、場曲校正、三片式鏡組、目鏡與無焦系統、反射式光學系統設計、數位相機取像鏡頭設計專題、變焦鏡頭設計專題
description.en: Paraxial Optics, Ray Tracing, Seidel Aberrations, Chromatic Aberrations, Principles of Lens Design, Achromatic Doublet Objective, Petzval Lenses, Triple Cooke Lens, Eyepiece and Afocal System, Catadioptric System, Special topic on Digital Still Camera, Special topic on Zoom Lens

notes: 電腦課，四光四最後一哩合開(限15人)

description.zh: 簡介核能電廠安全系統之設計準則及重要組件使用材料。以核能電廠重要組件為單元，探討其設計需求及主要應用材料之特性、運轉條件與行為、老劣化機制、防治措施及修補改正技術與策略。
description.en: Introduce to the design criteria of nuclear power safety systems and the utilized material of major components. Introduce to the design requirements of major components and the characterization, operation condition, behavior experience, degradation and aging mechanisms, the strategies of mitigation, repare and correction action, as well as the aging management programs. etc...

description.zh: 本課程訓練運用數位科技能力，以進行建築領域中的複雜幾何設計形體的發展、描述、資訊擷取，並透過系統化流程加以合理化，以至建造完成。本課程授課方式為演講及實作並行，課程預期修課者發展出一套有創意的數位構築系統。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in digital technologies for extracting, developing, and analyzing data of complex geometries, while facilitating production of a systematic workflow for rationalization and constructability. The course will be conducted in the forms of lectures and tutorials, and expects students to develop unique and creative systems of digital fabrication.

description.zh: 高階生態規劃設計理論及工具方法引介及論證；討論主題包含生態規劃方法、法定規範體制、規劃設計實證案例研究。
description.en: This course focuses on the issues of the green buildings and sustainable cities. Its major content includes: 1. Study of Methodology for Ecosystem, human environment and architecture, 2. essay of administrative regulation of Green Building and Sustainable Cities, 3. The case study of Green Building design and Sustainable City Planning.

notes: 英文授課，限本所國際生修課

description.zh: 1. 授課目的：  現代都市計劃及都市設計作業內容中，必須考量都市永續環境生態之議題。本課程之目的即在於傳述都市之生態概念在規劃實務上之應用，並探討其作業技術內容及其行政程序，以培養學生永續都市及敷地計畫規劃能力。2. 授課內容：  由基本永續都市中，思考生態環境、人類生活環境及建築之間的相互關係。綠建築、永續都市之內容。引介各項生態技術原理及其指標講授，進而指導實證操作技術實驗並撰寫論文，再而論證其都計管制規範。3. 作業練習：  本學期藉由實驗操作、論文報告撰寫，特別著重研討式論辯，訓練學術思辯及技術應用規劃能力，以利學生認識都市生態技術及都計行政作業之整體關聯性，進而建立其全方位規劃思辯能力。
description.en: This course focuses on the issues of the environmental planning, green buildings and sustainable urban design. Its major content includes: 1. Study of relation between Ecosystem, human environment and architecture, 2. essay of Green Building and Sustainable Cities, 3. The case study of Green Building design and Sustainable City Planning.

name.en: Special Topic on the Aesthetic of Architectural Construciton

description.zh: 在每個文明的進程中，會因為其環境風土條件與技術需求，發展出來其特有的建築營造系統，而在此營造系統中，又會因為建築空間文化形式、材料、審美等不同的內在或是外在的條件，進而發展出在建築的整體空間與構造細部上有不同的作法。本課程分別針對人類的建築歷史上重要的建築文明系統發展與其美學，從希臘時期、羅馬時期、哥德時期的石造建築技術，一直到十九世紀工業革命以後至廿世紀的鑄鐵、鋼鐵、鋼筋混凝土等現代建築發展過程中的建築構造，以材料特性與工法內容分別討論其形貌以及美學建構的內容。
description.en: In Human History, each civilization would develop its construction system, which might be influenced by the physic environment and the technics it requests.  In similar or different construction systems, it would derive into different aspects and ways of combination in the spatial forms and constructive d?tails, due to the inner or outer conditions, such as different cultural forms, materials and aesthetics, etc.This seminar bases on the architectural history of different civilizations, from Greek, Roman, Gothic epochs, to the post industrial r?volution of the Nineteenth Century and Twentieth Century.  We would like to study the aspect and aesthetic through the ancient architecture of mason construction to those modern or modernist architecture of different materials such as iron, steel, or reinforced concrete, etc.

description.zh: 本課程從社會、藝術、環境、哲學思想與文化等角度剖析二十世紀後地景建築所呈現的各種面向。課程含蓋：一、當代地景建築的前身、萌芽與趨勢。二、當代主要思潮與地景建築的詮釋。三、當代地景建築師和作品之批評與研討。
description.en: This course pinpoints on various aspects of landscape architecture from the 20th century onwards. Social, artistic, environmental, philosophical, and cultural viewpoints involved along the flow of contemporary landscape architecture are to be included. Contents consists of:   1 The germs, predecessors and trends of contemporary landscape architecture.   2 Contemporary interpret on landscape architecture.   3 Critics and Seminars on landscape architects and works of contemporary significance.

name.zh: 專業證照研訓進階講座
name.en: Advanced professional certification of the institute seminars

description.zh: 為因應近年全球與國內經濟不景氣，各校將更關切社會、經貿與人力市場動態，力圖革新以求招生與就業之競爭力。思考工程產業與商業服務業的科班培育人數，並加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本研訓進階講座課程針對國內外商管專業證照實務的研究與探討，以培育學生參加並通過國內與國際商管專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices of professional licenses in business and management, nurture students to participate in domestic and international professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation.

notes: 上ABC三節課12週四管三最後一哩合開限55人計網312教室

name.zh: 國際觀培養-布局全球‧放眼國際

description.zh: 本課程藉由企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以企業品牌之實際案例，讓同學們更能了解品牌行銷非一蹴可及，惟有落實長期經營才能獲得此成效。亦培養同學獨立思考之能力，減少自行摸索的時間，輕鬆掌握品牌觀念與實務，成為炙手可熱的品牌行銷人才。
description.en: The course aims to develop the knowledge and skills needed to prepare the managers to create an enduring advantage for their brand. Through sharing the experiences and case study on brand management, integrated marketing communication, and export promotion by enterprises, students can benefit to apply the knowledge and concepts in practical brand management. They can inspired independent and creative thinking on brand marketing from the course; moreover, they can trained for branding marketing talents in global arena.

notes: (上ABC三節課)四管二與經管所、最後一哩合開

description.zh: 以工作站級電腦輔助工業設計軟體 Microstation 之使用為主，教授學生基本模型之建立方法，並介紹單一模型之材質著色及場景營造方式，進而教授動畫之製作方式，以此為主題使學生能將模型以更活潑的動畫方式呈現。
description.en: The study of computer workstation industrial aided design software, Microstation, emphasizing on the models construction, materials editing, scene planning and animation, to present the computer models in the active animation.

name.zh: 創業講座-網路創新與創業
name.en: Model of Entrepreneurs –Internet Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的發展，電子商務的產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，面對這波網路創業風潮，應如何在茫茫網海中嶄露頭角？網路上沒有絕對正確的答案，最好的學習方式就是彼此分享成功經驗。這次講座特別邀請國內知名的網路創業達人，分享他們的創業故事。走吧，跟著這次講座來趟冒險吧！
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. How do you create a successful internet business endeavor?There is no specific success formula; the best way is to learn from the experts in this field. This course will invite well-known internet entrepreneurs to share their success stories with the students and allow students to gain insights to various internet business models.

notes: (上ABC三節課)四管二與經管所、最後一哩合開

description.zh: 隨著資訊技術與網路科技的發展，促成了城市發展的新樣態。IBM公司在全球化背景下針對社會變遷、科技應用、綠能環保、及永續發展等問題，提出了「智慧城市」的新思維。在國際間也引發其研究與規劃的創新領域。台灣近幾年來為能達成「智慧台灣」的發展目標，並推動台灣的智慧城市及相關產業發展，經濟部技術處在2009年中成立了「經濟部智慧生活科技運用計畫推動辦公室」，以推動智慧生活科技運用計畫，除將帶動「智慧生活」產業的發展，也將師法國外典範進行「智慧城市」的規劃，打造台灣的智慧城市。本課程即在上述國家重大發展策略的架構下，引領建築與都市設計研究所的研究生，透過專論與實作的方式，探討未來「智慧城市」的思維，並透過與資訊科技跨領域知識的整合，融入智慧生活的需求，提出「智慧城市」規劃的架構、願景與策略。
description.en: This course introduces graduate students to the newly developed concept about the intelligent cities and how they are planned and implemented. The concept of intelligent city was proposed by the IBM with globalization background. It is a new and innovation research field, which include inter-discipline integration. The course is organized into two parts:  Part1 explore the Basic which to form an intelligent city. It will start with classroom lecture, speech and paper reading and using intelligent cities case study around the world as references. We will examine the key components that form an intelligent city.Part2 will use a target community as a practical case study area and use people participation and community enforcement model to propose a prototype of an intelligent city will be. The results will be illustrated and presented to the local community.

description.zh: 本課程主要在研討傳統的結構化語言的編譯技術。課程所所涵蓋的內容包括有：- 語句上的分析、語句分析器的製作- 由上而下的組譯器製作- 由下而上的組譯器製作- 語意分析- 機器碼之產生與暫存器之配置- 資料流分析的理論與應用- 程式碼最佳化處理課程的實施，將以基本編譯技術為主，作深入的介紹。學習所得的觀念與技術，將利用一個實驗性語言編譯器的實作來貫穿。因此，程式規畫實作，將在這個課程中，佔有相當大的比重。

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.影像簡介， 2.顏色空間， 3.類比影像介面， 4.數位影像介面， 5.數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9.數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

description.zh: 1.高速PCB佈線設計的流程與基本原理 2.高速PCB的阻抗特性與反射現象 3.傳輸線的串音現象 4.電源與接線佈線技術 5.高速PCB中穿孔、連接器與IC封裝的探討 6.輸出入緩衝器資訊規格模型 7.高速PCB的量測技術 8.案例說明
description.en: 1.Flow and Fundamentals of High-Speed PCB Layout Design 2.Impedance Characteristic and Reflections in High-Speed PCB 3. Crosstalk in High-Speed PCB 4.Layout Technology of Power and Connection Lines 5.Discussion of Vias, Connectors, and Packages in High-Speed PCB 6.IBIS (I/O Buffer Information Specification) model 7.Measurement Technology of High-Speed PCB 8. Case Study

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 課程綱要： 1.半導體元件簡介 2.物理氣相沉積 3.化學氣相沉積 4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影 5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻 6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法 7.氧化和熱處理製程
description.en: Course Outline： 1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device 2.Physical Vapor Deposition 3.Chemical Vapor Deposition 4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development 5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching 6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation 7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意（1） 瞬時平面運動學：Hartman構圖法,反曲點元，切線圓，Euer- Savary方程式，Bobillier構圖法，四連桿組耦桿之直線包絡線方程式，                      Higher Curvature（2） 平面連桿機構分析：Freudenstein方程式，速度及加速度，傳遞角與機械利益，多迴路連桿組分析（3） 其它機構分析：凸輪，齒輪組，非圓形齒輪
description.en: （1） Instantaneous Plane Kinematics:       Hartman's construction, Inflection circle ,Tangential circle ,Euler -Savary Equation ,Bobillier's construction, Higher curvature （2） Analysis of plane Linkage:        Freudenstein Equation, Velocity and Acceleration, Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage, Multiple-Loop linkage （3） Analysis of Cams, Gear Trains, Non-Circular Gears.

description.zh: 本課程分三單元，包括：(1)奈米薄膜製程與檢測技術：奈米薄膜之定義、種類，奈米薄膜特性與應用，奈米薄膜製程，物理蒸鍍法，化學蒸鍍法，超微結構之觀察、微區/微量之化學組成分析，微奈米材料之機械性質檢測，微奈米材料之磁性、光、電性檢測，微奈米材料檢測所需試片之加工技術。(2)奈米生物科技：細胞生物學，分子細胞生物學，病毒，DNA與蛋白質操控，光電生物技術，奈微米製程技術，生物高分子監測系統整合實例介紹，專題報告。(3)矽奈米電子元件：奈米矽技術簡介，奈米矽元件前瞻物理，各種奈米電子元件可能之應用，奈米矽元件之電特性量測，專題報告。
description.en: (1) Nano Thin Film Processing and Characterizations: Definition classification, characteristics, and applications of nano-film, fabrication process, the related metrology and analysis tools of nano material. (2) Nanobiotechnology: Introduction of cytobiology, molecular cell virus, manipulation of DNA and protein, optoelectronics metrology on biotechnology, nano/micro fabrication technology, case study of biopolymer detection system. (3) Sliconnano electronic device: Introduction of nano silicon technology, advanced physics of nano silicon device predicted applications of variety of nano electronic device, electrical measurement of nano silicon device.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹(2)完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b)直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c)變異分析。(3)應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

description.zh: 實際演練室內設計工程中由生活需求分析及調查,規劃設立,施工,協調,管理等各種活動.並綜合性掌握環境中各種條件以習得室內設計的手法.
description.en: The Course is divided into five units: 1). The Nineteenth Century: The Industrial Revolution was the major influence on architectural history development. Structures of this period were marvels of engineering using materials like iron, plate glass, and reinforced concrete in new types of construction. 2). Foundation of Modernism (1890-1920) : In this period, the art community, including Cubism, Expressionism, De Stijl, Futurism and Constructivism, greatly influenced the form of building. 3).Modernism(1920-1970) : In this period, emphasises were placed on the "Less is More" , historicism and ornament were abandoned, the replacement were form and function, reason and abstraction. 4).Postmodernism (1965-1989) : Postmodernism architecture is characterized by the idea of "Less is Boring", and was inspired by Classical tradition and historical precedents. 5).Contemporary Pluralism : In the latter part of the twentieth century, an architect doesn't want to be associated with a movement, unle

notes: 家室組(四創意三和四設三合開)

description.zh: 本課程內容主要希望讓學生認識「核輻射」及其安全與防護。修習內容將包括：輻射與物質作用、輻射度量與劑量、輻射防護與安全、輻射防護法規、核能安全之設計、放射性廢棄物處置、輻射的化學效應和生物效應、基本醫學影像技術-- X射線攝影、核磁共振、正子掃瞄。
description.en: The goal of this lecture hopes to offer students the knowledge in "Nuclear Radiation". It mainly includes: Interaction between matter and radiation; Radiation measurement and dosimetry; Radiation protection and safety; Regulation of radiation protection; Design in Nuclear safety; Radioactive waste management; Chemical and Biological effects by radiation; Basic introduction to medical imaging: CT, NMR, PET.

name.zh: 創業講座-網路創新與創業
name.en: Model of Entrepreneurs –Internet Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的發展，電子商務的產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，面對這波網路創業風潮，應如何在茫茫網海中嶄露頭角？網路上沒有絕對正確的答案，最好的學習方式就是彼此分享成功經驗。這次講座特別邀請國內知名的網路創業達人，分享他們的創業故事。走吧，跟著這次講座來趟冒險吧！
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. How do you create a successful internet business endeavor?There is no specific success formula; the best way is to learn from the experts in this field. This course will invite well-known internet entrepreneurs to share their success stories with the students and allow students to gain insights to various internet business models.

notes: (上ABC三節課)四管二與經管所、最後一哩合開，限300

name.zh: 國際觀培養-布局全球‧放眼國際

description.zh: 本課程藉由企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以企業品牌之實際案例，讓同學們更能了解品牌行銷非一蹴可及，惟有落實長期經營才能獲得此成效。亦培養同學獨立思考之能力，減少自行摸索的時間，輕鬆掌握品牌觀念與實務，成為炙手可熱的品牌行銷人才。
description.en: The course aims to develop the knowledge and skills needed to prepare the managers to create an enduring advantage for their brand. Through sharing the experiences and case study on brand management, integrated marketing communication, and export promotion by enterprises, students can benefit to apply the knowledge and concepts in practical brand management. They can inspired independent and creative thinking on brand marketing from the course; moreover, they can trained for branding marketing talents in global arena.

notes: (上ABC三節課)四管二與經管所、最後一哩合開，限300

description.zh: 本課程將給學生從較廣義的風險管理範疇對風險值有一番認識與瞭解，主要包含以下三個部份：第一部份介紹風險值，將從近來風險管理的理論與實務發展討論其起源與基本觀念；第二部份說明衡量風險值的方法，包括變異數共變數法、歷史模擬、蒙地卡羅模擬及壓力測試；第三部份從風險值的觀點說明風險管理的相關議題，包括1) 決策法則，例如投資與避險法則。2) 信用風險。3)流動性、作業及法律風險。4)資本配置。5)企業風險管理。
description.en: This course gives students an overview of VaR, viewed in its broader risk management context. Totally, there will be three parts in this course. Part One is an introduction, which discusses the origins and basics of VaR in the context of recent developments in the theory and practice of risk management. Part Two deals with the approaches of measuring VaR, including variance-covariance approach, historical simulation, Mote Carlo simulation and stress testing. Part Three then deals with risk management issues from a VaR perspective, including 1) decision-making rules, such as investment and hedging rules; 2) credit risks; 3) liquidity, operational and legal risks; 4) capital allocation; 5) firm-wide risk management.

description.zh: 使學生建立邏輯量化思考，並了解管理科學解決問題之方法及應用，且有能力利用電腦工具協助分析經營管理問題，達成最佳化決策。
description.en: To build the quantitative logic thinking about the decision problems. The course is designed to introduce the fundamental techniques and methods of operations research. The related software will be utilized to aid in building and solving models. The topics to be covered: linear programming, what-if analysis, dual theory, transportation and assignment.

description.zh: 本實習著重在材料的合成法，包含人工晶體及各式無機材料的合成實作。實驗設計皆搭配「材料合成」授課內容，所得之樣品將進一步做表面與結構上的分析。核心實驗計有： (1)固態反應法合成鈦酸鋇粉末 (2)化學氣相沈積法沈積薄膜材料 (3)沉澱法合成磁性氧化鐵粉末 (4)溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽粉末 (5) 溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽薄膜 (6)氧化還原法合成金奈米顆粒 (7) 磷酸二氫銨晶體成長 (8) 物理氣相沈積法沈積金薄膜材料
description.en: The laboratory sections in this course are designed to synthesize various inorganic materials. Eight experiments will be carried out in a semester including: 1. Synthesis of BaTiO3 powders by solid-state reaction 2. Preparation of thin film by chemical vapor deposition 3. Synthesis of magnetic Fe3O4 powders by precipitation reaction 4. Synthesis of SiO2 powders by sol-gel reaction 5. Synthesis of SiO2 thin film by sol-gel reaction 6. Synthesis of Au nanoparticles by oxidation-reduction reaction 7. Crystal growth of NH4H2PO4 8. Preparation of gold thin film by physical vapor deposition.

description.zh: 介紹空中攝影測量以及遙測的概念、原理，製作DTM與判釋影像的技術，訓練學生應用遙測資訊的初步技巧。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts regarding the aerial photogrammetry and remote sensing. The production of DTM and interpretation of aerial photos and satellite images are included.

name.en: Special topics in mineral resources engineering 1

description.zh: 為增強學生對於學術論文的研究能量，本課程針對本所研究生對於資源處理與材料製程個別研究領域做更深層之學術與工業應用專業養成。內容包含各指導教授專業領域進階鑽研、研究室未來發展研究領域之開創與新研究團隊共同學術探討....等等。選課事項: 必須針對研究生個別之研究方向經指導教授同意選擇適當之課程。
description.en: In order to investigate of an advanced nature leading to the preparation of a thesis or dissertation, this course deals with the theory and industrial practice of mineral resources engineering. It covers the specific research and development topics in raw materials and mineral resources reutilization.Prerequisite: Permission of advisor, based on adequate background in relative reseach field.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002011或負責教授同意。特徵值、特徵向量及特徵函數，向量分析、向量微積分、傅立葉級數與邊界值問題、偏微分方程、複變函數。
description.en: Eigenvalue and Eigenfunction Problems, Vector Analyses, Calculus of Vectors, Fourier Series, Boundary Value Problems, Partial Differential Equations, Complex Analyses.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討土木工程施工品質的內容，並藉由諸如統計品管，QC七大手法，ISO9000等品管技能與精義，探討改進工程品質，防止土木災害的相關技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

name.zh: 低碳環境規劃與設計實務
name.en: The practice of Low carbon environment planning & design

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在研究目前生態環境議題與強化並整合有關低碳環境規劃設計的理論與經驗，以及增進對環境整體規劃與設計可能途徑的瞭解。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the nature of eco- environmental issues, and further integrate our knowledge about low carbon theories and experiences with the various approaches to environmental planning and design. Our hope is to improve planning and design practice.

notes: (上ABC三節，六週)四建三與最後一哩合開，限150人

description.zh: 建立設計專業用德文基礎；德文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業德文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關德文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of German to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based German.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

description.zh: 1.電路元件2.電路特性3.網路方程式4.穩態分析及頻率響應5.網路函數：極點及零點6.雙埠網路分析7.傅利葉及拉普拉斯轉換
description.en: 1.Circuit components2.Circuit characteristics3.Network equations4.Steady state analysis and frequency response5.Network Functions: poles and zeros6.Two-port network analysis7.Fourier and laplace transform

description.zh: 1.傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2.離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3.Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling2.Frequcy response of discrete time system3.IIR digital filter design4.FIR digital filter design5.Discrete fourier transform6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 本課程的目的在介紹生物反應工程，也就是如何將工程原理應用在生物程序。本課程內容可分為二大部分：生物系統的概述與工程的原理應用，第一部分將包括細胞的結構、複製與生長，生物化學反應的種類及其特性，細胞的主要代謝路徑等，第二部分則探討生物反應器的種類及其操作特性與應用，生物反應器內的質傳、熱傳及流動型態，產品回收與純化。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of bioprocess engineering, which is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze bioprocesses. The course will first survey the basics ideas from microbiology and biochemistry. Subsequently, the emphasis will be the application of engineering concepts to biological problems. The following topics will be included: enzyme kinetics, major metabolic pathways, cell growth, stoichiometry, bioreactor operation, and product recovery and purification.

description.zh: 本課程係提供全校學生與創意理論與實務界交流的平台，提供學生建立創意發展的理論與實務經驗，協助學生進行創意開展之操作，透過邀請國內著名之設計與發明界相關之產、官、學界專家進行專題講座，及舉辦創意工作營(workshop)與分組討論教學，經由專家學者之經驗分享與傳承，以激發學生創意進行相關產品之研發，開發學生創意之潛能。
description.en: This class provides a platform for students to communicate with creative scholars and industry specialists in order to gain more experience of developing creativity and practice. Aiming to stimulate students' creative thinking and product developing ability, this class holds creative workshops &, group discussions, and invites famous experts of industry, official and academic territories to give speeches.

notes: 四設三及四.創新所.最後一哩(限非設計學院20人）合開

description.zh: 以CAD繪圖軟體為教學範本，熟悉及應用繪圖指令，繪製機械之二度、三度空間的機械圖形，並能充分應用電腦的功能，以達輔助機械製圖及電腦輔助設計為目標。
description.en: Prerequisite: ME151 or Consent of InstructorUse commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and to modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

description.zh: 本課程係提供全校學生與創意理論與實務界交流的平台，提供學生建立創意發展的理論與實務經驗，協助學生進行創意開展之操作，透過邀請國內著名之設計與發明界相關之產、官、學界專家進行專題講座，及舉辦創意工作營(workshop)與分組討論教學，經由專家學者之經驗分享與傳承，以激發學生創意進行相關產品之研發，開發學生創意之潛能。
description.en: This class provides a platform for students to communicate with creative scholars and industry specialists in order to gain more experience of developing creativity and practice. Aiming to stimulate students' creative thinking and product developing ability, this class holds creative workshops &, group discussions, and invites famous experts of industry, official and academic territories to give speeches.

notes: 四設三及四.創新所.最後一哩(限非設計學院20人）合開

description.zh: 醫療器材簡介、我國醫療器材管理制度與發展趨勢、FDA/ISO醫療器材認證制度、醫療器材開發流程與風險分析、醫療器材生物相容性質測試 (ISO 10993)、醫療器材醫電相容性質測試、醫療器材軟體驗證、良產品製造規範(Good Manufacturing Practice, GMP)、優良實驗室操作(Good Laboratory Practice, GLP)、優良細胞操作規範 (Good Tissue Practice, GTP)、醫療器材優良臨床試驗(Good Clinical Practice, GCP)、醫療器材臨床試驗基本考量：醫學倫理與病患安全、醫療器材的臨床試驗與查核、醫療器材上市審查、案例討論（I）人工植體、案例討論(II) 軟體開發、案例討論(III) 血液透析相關產品、Final Exam / 期末報告

description.zh: 本課程透過分析及審視地道新聞教材如電視、網站、報紙、廣播的時事、深度報導和全球議題，加強學生英語字彙能力、聽力及寫作技巧。
description.en: Description The course is designed to enhance students’ overall ability in news vocabularies, listening and writing skills through analyzing and examining authentic news materials, such as up-to-date news stories, in-depth reports and global issues from TV, websites, newspaper and radio.

notes: 共同選修,不列入畢業學分

description.zh: 本課程透過研讀文學經典著作學習英文。研讀名著既可領略文學經典蘊含的智慧、對生命的洞見，又可藉細讀作品的遣詞造句和謀篇佈局吸取英文精華，培養對文字的敏感和創意。
description.en: This course aims to approach English through literature. Reading classics inspires insights into life and challenges accepted values. By close reading of different genres, sentence structures, and vocabularies used in the texts, students' sensitivity to the language can be developed and an idiomatic English can be acquired.

notes: 共同選修,不列入畢業學分

name.zh: 就業達人講座-人資需求大搜密

description.zh: 本課程透過知名企業主管及各大領域專家與同學交流，透過他們職場多年經驗與同學分享時間管理與壓力管力、職場生存技巧，強化學生的職場力與人生定位的觀念，最後並安排企業參訪協助學生提早瞭解自我性向,發覺潛能,做好生涯規劃，開設「就業講座(二)-企業家的用人哲學」之課程，藉由企業參訪與業界實際案例，提前為進入做好身心靈的準備。
description.en: The course mainly invites managers and experts of well-known enterprises to share working experience and professional knowledge. After the classes with experts and industrial managers, the course includes an industrial visit to help students to gain more ideas about career. The course is eventually expected to have the result of emphasizing student's capabilities in terms of future work and life planning. Hope the course can provide a direction and some knowledge to students and they can be more prepared to work.

notes: 四化四甲乙、化工所與最後一哩合開(限180人)

description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生懂得基本的微生物學外，更將引導學生練習閱讀一些國外期刊的最新研究，內容包括：微生物分子遺傳、微生物免疫、微生物生理及微生物與藥物等知識。
description.en: This course will let students to learn basic microbiology; furthermore, will introduce students to learn how to read SCI journals and new knowledge in microbiology. It contains molecular genetics of microorganisms, immunology of microorganisms, physiology of microorganisms and the relationships between microorganisms and drugs.

name.en: Service Systems Design and Risk Management

description.zh: 藉由服務系統之本質與內涵之定義，使學生了解服務系統之規劃策略、設計、與作業面之運作考量，達成一個有效的服務系統，並滿足顧客之最終需求。此外，在進行服務設計同時，亦需考量過程中所具備之風險。透過認識風險管理的思維邏輯與策略模式，並從中學習正確的風險管理知識，以避免設計失敗。課程中亦加入適當之國內、外服務系統之個案分析，使學生了解相關之成功實施個案之精華所在。
description.en: This course is focused on the definitions and contents of service system and investigates the planning, design, and operational perspectives of these service systems to effect. Moreover, risk during the service design is concerned. Learning the theory of risk management is also the key issue in this course. Provides cases can help students get the insights of their successful operational decision.

description.zh: 本課程分為Dreamweaver網頁設計、PHP與MySQL基礎，以及互動網頁設計等三部份。包括Dreamweaver的網頁圖文編輯、表格製作、超連結、分割框架、佈景主題應用、動態網頁、表單設計、網站的發佈與管理，以及PHP與MySQL環境設定、MySQL資料庫管理、SQL基本語法、PHP程式設計入門、用PHP存取MySQL等；讓同學有能力設計一個商業網站。
description.en: The course is for the designation of commercial web site. The is course composed of 3 parts:（1）Dreamweaver（2）PHP（3）MySQL data base.Learning how to build up the commercial website.

notes: 計網電腦教室313，陳書儀老師

name.zh: 國際觀培養-國際商務禮儀及溝通
name.en: Global Perspective - International Business Etiquette and Communication Skill

description.zh: 本課程講授以國際交流中社交及商務場域為主軸，深入分析國際人士於跨文化溝通中需具備之策略與技巧。
description.en: This course center its emphasis on international communication in various social and business contexts, strategies and skills will be introduced to enhance students' international communicative competence.

notes: (上ABC三節課，六週)四英二最後一哩合開限180人

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹微觀之固體表面結構與現象。課程內容包括微觀之固體表面結構，固體表面之吸附、擴散、脫附現象，表面偏析現象，分子和表面間之鍵結，表面反應的熱力學與動力學，以及各種表面分析的技術。
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with atomic-level understanding of surface structure and surface phenomena. The course focuses on the surproperties of the solid-gas and solid-vacuum interfaces because most of the results of modern surface-science studies on the atomic level come from the scrutiny of these interfaces. It contains the following topics: the atomic-level structure of clean and adsorbate-covered surfaces, adsorption and desorption, surface diffusion, surface segregation, the nature of the surface bonding, the adsorbate-adsorbate interaction, energy transfer during gas-surface interactions and surface reaction; surface analysis techniques.

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 大三下特教生(限領有聽障手冊)視教201

description.zh: 開課：機電、製科所合開（上學期）(含一般生、在職生)本課程說明RFID系統架構，技術、編碼、和應用標準，資訊系統，效益評估，隱私權問題，及各領域或產業的創新應用和案例。
description.en: This course is to explain the RFID system structure, the standard of technology, object coding and applications, IT solution systems, ROI considerations, privacy issues, and then the innovative applications in different field or industry.

name.zh: 智慧電子應用設計概論
name.en: Introduction to the Design and Application of Intelligent Electronic Systems

description.zh: 本課程以瞭解多媒體通訊及射頻識別的基本工程原理，以及所需應用的人機介面互動設計知識，藉由相關入門的觀念與技術的學習，並結合授課與實作，使學生在設計實務上能有更多的認知。本課程的內容包含數位多媒體影像及通訊基礎、影像增強技術、人機介面設計、射頻識別理論與應用以及互動設計。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the engineering knowledge of multi-media telecommunication and RFID technology, as well as interface design. Students can learn related basic concept and technique, through lecturing and practice work, so as to enhance understanding on this cross-field course. The course contents encompass digital multi-media image and telecommunication, image enhancement technology, interface design, RFID theory and application, and interaction design.

notes: 四電子四四創意四最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作，包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧，正確組織文章的各個片段，避免口語用字寫字的陋習，使所作之文章能掌握其涵意，亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Thesis Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師辛法春,北大三峽校區文學院2F02博雅選修文學

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

description.zh: 設計心理學旨在於了解設計心理學理論，以及以使用者為中心之設計。課程包含現代心理學基本概念與原則，及人類情緒的互動、認知與感知和產品設計之關係。此外，學生需了解如何將理論實際應用於產品設計上。
description.en: On completion of this course students should have an understanding of design psychology theory and user-centered design. The course includes the basic principles of modern psychology and concepts, interaction of emotion with cognition and perception. In addition, students should be able to understand the theories of these applications in product design.

description.zh: 邀請具備國際設計競賽得獎經驗之業界專家與優秀設計師，分享得獎設計作品的創作起源與設計過程。邀請設計業界各領域之專家，針對學生在未來就業之職涯規劃與相關工作的技能需求進行分享與介紹。
description.en: Invite experts and excellent designers who have international design award， sharing creative works and the origin of the design process.Invite designer and experts to introduce who is company need people in the future.

description.zh: 本課程目標在為本校碩博士班的同學做好英語終身學習的準備。確切學習要點：1.	建立個人英文資料檔案(含自傳、履歷、求職信件等)。2.	學習如何運用媒體與英語雜誌及廣播持續不斷地自我提升英文程度。3.	以活潑的上課方式(唱歌、短劇、演講、講笑話等)培養同學英語溝通表達的能力與膽量。4.	以閱讀英語學習雜誌培養閱讀能力，並藉由內容的深入討論擴大視野，了解全球現勢與重要議題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to help students (1) sharpen up their learning skills in English language/culture acquisition, (2) prepare a personal dossier (including autobiography, resume, CV and application letters) in English for their future career needs, (3) build up their communication skills through classroom activities, such as singing, reciting passages, short plays, small talks, and speeches.

notes: 一教101教室,限電機及工管系碩博士學生選修(名單內)

name.zh: 智慧電子應用設計概論
name.en: Introduction to the Design and Application of Intelligent Electronic Systems

description.zh: 本課程以瞭解多媒體通訊及射頻識別的基本工程原理，以及所需應用的人機介面互動設計知識，藉由相關入門的觀念與技術的學習，並結合授課與實作，使學生在設計實務上能有更多的認知。本課程的內容包含數位多媒體影像及通訊基礎、影像增強技術、人機介面設計、射頻識別理論與應用以及互動設計。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the engineering knowledge of multi-media telecommunication and RFID technology, as well as interface design. Students can learn related basic concept and technique, through lecturing and practice work, so as to enhance understanding on this cross-field course. The course contents encompass digital multi-media image and telecommunication, image enhancement technology, interface design, RFID theory and application, and interaction design.

notes: 四電子四四創意四最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

notes: 二年級重補修課程(適用98年度前入學生)

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students.  This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles.  Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

notes: 限機電學院碩班學生修讀(名單內)【停開】

name.zh: 專業證照研訓進階講座
name.en: Advanced professional certification of the institute seminars

description.zh: 為因應近年全球與國內經濟不景氣，各校將更關切社會、經貿與人力市場動態，力圖革新以求招生與就業之競爭力。思考工程產業與商業服務業的科班培育人數，並加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本研訓進階講座課程針對國內外商管專業證照實務的研究與探討，以培育學生參加並通過國內與國際商管專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices of professional licenses in business and management, nurture students to participate in domestic and international professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation.

notes: 上ABC三節課12週四管三最後一哩合開限55人計網314教室
